description: Using pure Italian cashmere, we reinterpret the silhouette of our iconic Polo blazer as a knit cardigan. Signature gold-tone buttons complete the classic look.
fitting_details: Regular Fit: wider at the chest while still maintaining a modern silhouette.
Size medium has a 29¼" body length (front and back), a 17¼" shoulder, a 42" chest, and a 24½" sleeve length. Sleeve length changes ½" between sizes.
Notch lapels. Double-breasted silhouette. Signature gold-toned buttons.
Left chest patch pocket. Two front waist patch pockets.
Model is 6'1"/185 cm and wears a size medium.
